definition: A large organization or corporation consisting of multiple companies or subsidiaries, typically operating in various industries or sectors. It is commonly used to refer to a conglomerate or a group of interconnected businesses under a single management structure.

examples.german: Unser Unternehmen ist Teil eines großen Konzerns.
examples.english: Our company is part of a large conglomerate.

examples.german: Der Konzern erzielte im letzten Jahr hohe Gewinne.
examples.english: The corporation achieved high profits last year.

examples.german: Der Konzern ist in verschiedenen Branchen tätig.
examples.english: The corporation operates in various industries.
